title: Anoop and the elephant
creator_credit: Anvil Films, Children's Film Foundation, Hugh Stewart and David Eady
brief_description: Engaging and highly entertaining children’s adventure story set in the world of the circus. Anoop, an Indian boy, and his friends attempt to rescue a performing elephant (Riley) from a life in the circus. Cast includes Jimmy Edwards.
creator_credit_for_label: Anvil Films, Children’s Film Foundation, Hugh Stewart and David Eady
